name: Animal Transport Truck 2018
description:
Do you love animal transport games? Are animal zoo games or animal rescue games are fun? If yes then it's time to drive off road Safari Animal Transport Truck 2018 to rescue animals on hills and mountains.

Your transporting cargo is wild animals including Elephants, Gorilla, Lion, Panther, Leopard, Crocodile, Rhinoceroses & Giraffe and they need to be transported from the city to the Zoo and from the farm to the Village.

In this animal trucking job you need to load up the Wild animals and transport them carefully by driving heavy loader trailer truck on Safari jungle off road tracks. You need to transport all the zoo animals by saving wildlife animals. Don't scare the animals during safari jungle transport adventure and complete cargo truck transport missions by following basic off-road driving rules. You can also enjoy the real animals sounds while playing animal cargo truck simulator 2018 game.
